string-array.name: Foods
string-array.item: Tater Tot Chips w/ Loaded Green Onion Dip

string-array.name: Ingredients
string-array.item:
One 12-ounce package soft brioche baguette or sub rolls

 5 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted

 2/3 cup mayonnaise

 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley

 1 tablespoon finely grated lemon zest plus 2 tablespoons lemon juice (from about 1 lemon)

 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard

 2 teaspoons seafood seasoning, such as Old Bay

 2 scallions, thinly sliced

 1 tablespoon ketchup

 2 pinches cayenne pepper, or to taste

 1 1/2 pounds jumbo lump or lump crab meat, picked through for cartilage and shells

 1/2 cup plain breadcrumbs

 Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

 2 plum tomatoes, thinly sliced

 1 small head Bibb lettuce, separated into leaves

2 3/4 cups all-purpose flour

 1 1/2 teaspoons fine salt

 1 teaspoon baking powder

 1 teaspoon baking soda

 2 1/2 sticks unsalted butter, softened

 1 3/4 cups packed dark brown sugar

 2 large eggs, at room temperature

 2 teaspoons pure vanilla extract or vanilla bean paste

 One 12-ounce bag semisweet chocolate chips (about 2 cups)

Potato Tot Chips:


One 32-ounce bag frozen potato tots, such as Tater Tots


1/2 teaspoon sweet paprika

 Onion Dip:


6 slices bacon


16 ounces (2 cups) sour cream


8 ounces (1 cup) cream cheese, room temperature


1/2 teaspoon garlic powder


Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper


1 bunch scallions


1 cup shredded Cheddar
